function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Development of CODO ontology without expert input or validation","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of COVID-19 data and patient relationships","Mitigation":"Engage domain experts to review and validate the ontology","Technologies":"Expert review, validation workshops","People":"Authors, domain experts","Owner":"Authors"},{"Description":"Importing data from an unreliable or inaccurate source","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of COVID-19 data","Mitigation":"Verify the reliability and accuracy of the data sources","Technologies":"Data validation tools, expert review","People":"Authors, data experts","Owner":"Authors"},{"Description":"Inadequate security measures for the exported ontology data","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access and data breaches","Mitigation":"Implement strong access controls and encryption for the exported data","Technologies":"Access control systems, data encryption tools","People":"Authors, IT security experts","Owner":"Authors"}]}
